name: Cube Girl and the Simp Apocalypse
name_original: Cube Girl and the Simp Apocalypse
description:
Cube Girl and the Simp Apocalypse is a colorful bullet-hell rhythm game with an emphasis on movement and multitasking. You play as Cube Girl, aided by her friend Sally Square in their quest to simply see a movie.

So, Cube Girl is a big internet celebrity, right? And her and her best friend Sally Square are trying to go out to see a movie. But these guys, cube girls fans, keep showing up to try to talk to her. All types of dudes are showing up to see her. There's no end to their requests for autographs or confessions of love and they're gonna make Cube Girl late for the movie! Will Cube Girl and Sally Square get to the movie on time? Why do some of Cube Girl's fans look so angry? What else is on Sally Squares mind? Find the answers to all these questions and more in Cube Girl and the Simp Apocalypse!

Features:

  • Smooth physics based movement
  • 5 uniquely behaving enemy types ( two basic enemies and three special types )
  • 24 stages, each more challenging than the last
  • 8 cutscenes featuring the titular Cube Girl and her loyal side kick, Sally Square
  • Endless mode ( My highscore is around 7500 and I challenge anyone to beat it )
  • A unique visual style in which the game becomes more colorful the more you play
  • An option to completely turn off the previously mentioned visuals because some people hate it and that's okay
  • A star based scoring system for achievement hunters
  • Three difficulty options
  • Hand drawn expressive character art
  • 20 unique music tracks
  • Other cool features probably

Cube Girl and the Simp Apocalypse was developed throughout April and May of 2021 and it is my third released game.
